description.value:
You gain one of the following powers of your choice. This new power replaces the daily attack power you gained at 9th level.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.0YMWN6FVokmfheEb]{Brittle Frost Blade}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.zjmJA6oyK0MbqYQT]{Rejuvenating Harvest}
